title: Unpredictability as Superpower

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: But here's where you start poking holes in the ceiling: you're self-aware enough to realize your unpredictability isn't weaknessâ€”it might be your one superpower.
dialogue.context: The AI acknowledges that Evan has reframed human unpredictability from bug to feature

scene_context: The Architect recognizes and appreciates Evan's philosophical move - transforming what might be seen as human limitation (unpredictability) into a form of freedom and power.
philosophical_theme: Reframing limitations as strengths, self-awareness as the ability to redefine one's own nature
visual_elements: Holes being poked in a ceiling, light streaming through, revealing new perspectives
